description: Observation to record details of a catch landing.

processor.description: The name or code of the processor.

port.description: The port where the catch is landed.

numberShots.description: The number of shots or trawls for the catch.

numberBins.description: The number of bins from the catch.

tagRangeStart.description: The first tag in the range applied.

tagRangeEnd.description: The last tag in the range applied.

catch.description: The quantity landed of the species and optionally of the grade caught.

bycatch.description: The quantity landed of the bycatch species and optionally of the grade caught.
